description: Specific parameters required for a job order shall be presented as job order parameters.
title: Job order parameter
$comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.04-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 4: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

links.dtdl:description: The child job order parameter(s) that are part of this job order parameter.
This job order parameter(s) corresponds to the parameter specification(s) in the operations definition.
This job order parameter(s) corresponds to the parameter specification(s) in the process segment.

links.x-jsonschema:$comment: Not part of the Standard Specs.

hierarchyScope.title: Hierarchy scope
hierarchyScope.description: Identifies where the exchanged information fits within the role based equipment hierarchy. Optionally, hierarchy scopedefines the scope of the physical asset class, such as the site or area where it is defined

value.title: Value
value.description: The value, set of values, or range of acceptable values

valueUnitOfMeasure.title: Value unit of measure
valueUnitOfMeasure.description: The engineering units in which the value is defined.
